website_summaries.verdict: A traditional answering machine by AT&T that has some user-friendly features, but it also has some sound quality issues that could hinder its performance and reliability.
pros: Answer machine only in a straightforward design
cons: Recorded greeting as well as call play backs often have poor sound quality
No indication of the message record time

customer_reviews.title: nice anwering machine
customer_reviews.text: replaced a old answering machine.. compact, features as described, easy set up..good quality of sound. very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: kdale

customer_reviews.title: wow - cool
customer_reviews.text: perfect voice recorder for those who still have landlines. screens out spam calls + easy to install + good manual for set-up / operation + nice clean design + very affordable. has a pleasant default greeting or you can record your own. 5 STAR
customer_reviews.author: mbmoto

customer_reviews.title: If you record your own message, it is indistinguishable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this model because I liked the previous one #1739. However, if you want to personalize your recording, good luck. It is scratchy and high pitched. You can barely hear the recording. Unfortunately, the others I've found on the market didn't have the features I needed so I'll keep this one and use the pre-recorded recording which I don't like either because of what it says.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Generally a good machine
customer_reviews.text: Works well but the playback is sometimes a little unclear. Hard to tell if it is the machine or the original senders connection.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: The recorded messages have background noise like the old worn unit that I was trying to ...
customer_reviews.text: The unit is hard to program. The recorded messages have background noise like the old worn unit that I was trying to replace.
customer_reviews.author: George Hatcher

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I have my answering machine so that I need not try to hurry to my phone when it rings. If my phone rings and I am not near it, I let the machine pick up and listen to the message later and return the call or not. I live alone and getting to my phone is not always easy for me so this has simplified my life. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Jorj

customer_reviews.title: The answering machine is simple to set up.
customer_reviews.text: The T 1740 Digital Answering Machine arrived within two (2) days after ordering the machine. Once the answering machine was received, the set up process was so easy to be done. My previous answering machine which I had to remove and replace with the new machine was easy to set up, because the previous lines were already in place. I just had to connect the new attachment cords, which came with the machine. The machine's digital display is great and everything works well. It was a great investment.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I have only had one problem. I may need to move my answering machine further away from my phone. I answered my phone after the message started and had interference with machine. Other than than, no problems. Easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Kay

customer_reviews.title: I'm impressed
customer_reviews.text: Well, even in 2020 some rural residents still have to fight for phone services. Our only available company decided to drop voicemail, even for our business line. This presented the difficult task of finding a way to have voicemail that could be retrieved by people in and out of the office remotely, without everyone having to give access to confidential information on a computer. THIS DOES EXACTLY THAT. Programmed my own message, reset the code to what I wanted. Tested it, and absolutely impressed and thankful. I hate change - I like this.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Not all features worked.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my 89 year old father because his old one no longer recorded messages. He said everything worked all right except the adjustment for number of rings before answering. No matter what setting he chose, it always answered on the 8th ring. He said no one will let it ring that long to leave a message so he switched it out for his old one again and will put this one in his garage sale.
customer_reviews.author: N64Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Fails its primary task.
customer_reviews.text: There were several things I liked about this unit, but it failed in its primary task—recording messages. The first few seconds of a recording were clear but then static could be heard and it grew until the message was unintelligible. I changed phones but the result was always the same.
customer_reviews.author: William H. Hubbell

customer_reviews.title: Very good machine.
customer_reviews.text: Product is used for home as we are frequently out (RV Travels). Machine is excellent in all respects. Especially appreciate the volume control as so many calendar pages have flipped, my hearing is not what it used to be. Overall well worth the price and ease of installing and use.
customer_reviews.author: GEORGE COLMAN

customer_reviews.title: Updated smoothly
customer_reviews.text: Our previous answering machine was satisfactory, just old. It was a pleasant discover to see that the newest version came with excellent instructions, adding helpful features and easy interface. We are well satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Great for those who cant leave their landlines
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new answering machine for my grandparents, this works perfectly for them. worked as soon as it was plugged in, setting the date took a while with the voice responses but wasn't too much of a pain. Just what they needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what I had hoped for. Simple, easy to use, good features and also has great clarity in the messages. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Steven E.

customer_reviews.title: Works as good as the old one.
customer_reviews.text: My elderly aunt appreciated the older tried and true technology.
customer_reviews.author: Jogotenis

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Sounds terrible to the person calling in, very tinny. And there is apparently no way to turn off the 'annoucement' feature, so if anyone is with you they can hear whatever message is being used. Probably good for a home, but not a small business or home office.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Murray

customer_reviews.title: 5 Months and it Broke
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure what to say except i bought this in March and it broke.... 5 months into use.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Cheng

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is a single line answering machine. Works perfect. No distortion with personal greeting or message received. Great product for the price. Simple and easy to set up and use.
customer_reviews.author: Socorro L

customer_reviews.title: Gppd As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: So far, no problems. I had to buy a new one because the recorded message on the old one was hard to listen to...lots of static.
customer_reviews.author: Steve huth

customer_reviews.title: It also has alot of other features too!!!
customer_reviews.text: It was a great price, it came quickly and I love it!! Clear messages!!! My old one, which wasn't old....you could barely make out what the person was saying....I would recommend this one!!
customer_reviews.author: sandi

customer_reviews.title: How it hooks up to fax
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Wish there were instructions to hook up to the fax part of my copy machine but other than that, it's works great
customer_reviews.author: MILES411

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: seems to do what I want it to do,but still learning thanks
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Thanks.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the product, I just was just able to figure out what was wrong with my old answering machine. So I no longer needed this one. Trying to save money. I would recommend this new one to people it's a good product, and I received it quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie permenter

customer_reviews.title: Easy for us older folks
customer_reviews.text: I had no trouble using this. It is clear .
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Hasek

customer_reviews.title: This product is great! Very easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! Very easy to set up. Does exactly what I need it to do. I get messages. It is saved until I delete them. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: riye

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as promised.
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as promised. Very good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lippert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to set up with the clear instructions. Has worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Sherryl Paul;

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, compact, and inexpensive.
customer_reviews.text: This is the fourth answering machine I've had, and the second electronic one (my first two used tape). It's the easiest one to use I've ever owned: the voice prompts talk you through the various ways you can set it up -- how many rings before it picks up, do you want an audible alert, and many other options. Just read the instructions, then listen to the voice. Don't worry about whether using an answering machine is "old-fashioned." It's simple, trouble-free, and inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Notary Sojac

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use right out of the box, literally. Setup took less time than writing this review.
customer_reviews.author: goldwing guy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the beeping signal letting one know there are messages.
customer_reviews.author: Mellie S. Price

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and to hook up. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: I like that it s announces the number that is calling ...
customer_reviews.text: I like that it s announces the number that is calling and find the constantly repeating message waiting reminder beep highly annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Nananc

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Simple to set up and works so much better than the old version.
customer_reviews.author: Eric McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with this answering machine. It’s compact and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Bev2671

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I like the size of this machine and is perfect for my home office
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Verbal indication of incoming call versus a display
customer_reviews.text: Verbal indication of incoming call rather than a display of the number.....
customer_reviews.author: Grover Leon Booker

customer_reviews.title: Reverse return order.
customer_reviews.text: Reverse return of this item. I got it working. Reverse Amex credit. TKU
customer_reviews.author: Robert Goldberg

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to set up and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: carol petrus

customer_reviews.title: Unit was defective
customer_reviews.text: Unit did not work when received, several of the number buttons did not work.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for unpopular item nowadays!!
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly for non profit group I'm a member of. Thank you! I know answering machines are so unpopular now.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's an answering machine
customer_reviews.text: Product is OK. Sound quality could be better but who uses answering machines these days (besides my older parental unit)? Arrived on time and exactly what I expected, so I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Boheeber

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a real easy to use unit. works great...Use it mainly to deter telemarketers.
customer_reviews.author: Jetranger
